segments.text: I notice the boy stretching for the cookie jar, and it makes me nervous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool looks like it’s about to tip over any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for a treat, completely unaware of the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the woman should turn around and see what’s happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just pouring out of the sink, and she doesn’t even care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder how long this has been going on.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The scene outside the window is so peaceful, which makes the chaos inside even more ridiculous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t help but feel like something bad is about to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is really reaching far, and I don’t think he’s going to make it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope someone stops this before it’s too late.
segments.speaker: PAR
